sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import WeatherIcon from './WeatherIcon'; const CurrentWeather = ({ data }) => { if (!data) return null; return (

{data.name}

{new Date(data.dt * 1000).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })}

{Math.round(data.main.temp)}°

{data.weather[0].main}

{data.main.humidity}%

Humidity

{Math.round(data.wind.speed)} km/h

Wind speed

{data.pop ? Math.round(data.pop * 100) : 0}%

Precipitation

{data.main.feels_like}°

Feels like

); }; export default CurrentWeather;
